price: 2. Allaah, Ma jiro Ilaah (xaq lagu caabudo) aan Isaga ahayn, waa Noolaha Daa'inka ah, Daryeelaha waxa uunka jira ee dabbara,
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ḥayu al-qayūmu
translations: the Sustainer of all that exists
